message.content: {"id": "18016", "title": "Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo", "description": "Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo, but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.", "OB": "There are 6 menu entries enabled and none of them perform any action. The enabled menu entries are: open declaration, open type hierarchy, open super implementations, show in packages view, copy, and search. The 'copy' action does not work as of now. There is also a bug (bug 18015) related to the structured selection. This issue should be considered major as it is likely to affect many users.", "EB": "The 'convert line delimiters' menu action should also be disabled.", "SR": ""}
